snippet: Nearly a week of interruptions and slowdowns on Bank of America’s Web site spurred anger among account holders who were unable to pay bills electronically or check their balances.
lead_paragraph: Nearly a week of interruptions and slowdowns on Bank of America’s Web site spurred anger among account holders who were unable to pay bills electronically or check their balances.

headline.main: Heavy Traffic and New Computer System Disrupted Web Site, Bank of America Says
headline.print_headline: Heavy Traffic and New Computer System Disrupted Web Site, Bank of America Says
headline.seo: Bank of America Explains Web Site Problems
